message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_CANCELLED
message.locale: The milestone waiver approval check cannot be modified as it is already canceled.
The milestone waiver approval check cannot be modified as it is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: The milestone waiver approval check cannot be canceled as it is already canceled.
The milestone waiver approval check cannot be cancelled as it is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_FV_PERCENTAGE_VALUE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_FV_DUPLICATE_MILESTONE_TYPE
message.locale: This milestone type is already associated with an approval check. Please select a different type.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_XFV_APPLIES_TO_ALL_AND_MILESTONE_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: As this milestone waiver approval check applies to all milestones you must not select an individual milestone.
